text: Despite the serious acrimony at the time, I was struck by how many of the ex-Clinton partisans and ex-Clinton antagonists are now on friendly, even sort of buddy-buddy terms. Time heals all wounds!
author: GrahamDavidA

text: It was striking how many of them still firmly believe they did the right thing, even knowing what happened—including James Rogan, who was an impeachment manager, then lost his next reelection campaign some guy named @RepAdamSchiff.

text: Another thing is just how early many Republicans grasped that impeachment was going to be a political loser. Maybe they didn't get how big—but they knew that the idea of impeaching was unpopular. They had polling.
